articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Catalonia leaders decry direct rule plan
articles.description: President Carles Puigdemont says Catalonia will not accept Madrid's plan to curb the region's powers.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Japan goes to the polls in snap election
articles.description: Millions are voting in the election, which was called by Prime Minister Shinzo Abe last month.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Cadets killed in Kabul minibus bombing
articles.description: It brings the death toll from attacks in Afghanistan to around 200 in this week alone.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Mugabe's WHO appointment 'an insult'
articles.description: The UK government, an array of campaign groups and the Zimbabwe opposition express dismay.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump to allow release of JFK files
articles.description: The US president says he will allow scheduled release of classified files relating to Kennedy's assassination.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Can ballet help heal after a massacre?
articles.description: A new ballet tells the story of the aftermath of the racially motivated Charleston church shooting.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Magazine apologises to Solange for editing image
articles.description: The Evening Standard has apologised to Solange Knowles after it altered her hairstyle on the front cover of its magazine.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Militants slaughter Egypt security forces
articles.description: The forces are reported to have been looking for the militants' hideout when they came under attack.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Billionaire candidate wins Czech election
articles.description: Andrej Babis' party has secured almost triple the vote share of its closest rivals

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Man arrested after knife attack in Munich
articles.description: Police say no motive has been established for the attack, which lightly wounded four passers-by.
